This is episode 17 of our One Bedroom House series. Today you'll see how I go about adding annotations, dimensions, callouts, tags, window schedule, door schedule, and other details to a simple floor plan and foundation plan. 

I hope that you learn a thing or 3. Do me a favour - do one of the below...
